translation: The yogi, always engaging the mind thus (in the practice of yoga), is freed from sins and easily enjoys the infinite bliss of contact with Brahman (the Eternal).
commentary: 6.28 Yunjan practicing Yoga? Evam thus? Always always? Atmana the self? Yogi Yogi? Vigatakalmashah freed from sin? Happily easily? Brahmasamparsham caused by contact with Brahman? Extremely infinite? Happiness bliss? Ashnute enjoys.Commentary By Yogic practices such as the withdrawal of the senses? concentration and meditation he loses contact with the objects of the senses and comes into contact with Brahman
